description: The Limelight Hydrangea tree form is a stunning sight to behold each year. As an ornamental tree, it has stunning heart-shaped foliage and miniature pinecone-style flowers, which bloom in July. Its blossoms change from lime green to a deep pink, creating an eye-catching display of color. This sturdy tree can reach heights of up to 15 feet, and its branches can reach out 35 feet wide when mature. The Limelight Hydrangea tree form can be planted in a variety of soils, providing versatility for any landscape design. As an added bonus, it requires little maintenance and is highly resistant to disease, making it a reliable and sustainable choice for any home garden.
